name: Finest Roasted Chicken
description:
Please note that this item will be ready for delivery after two days from order placement due to the special preparation process. Therefore, we kindly request you to select your delivery date accordingly. Thank you!

Minimum delivery weight 900g

This oven roasted chicken is marinated with a range of exotic spices & herbs before it is fully roasted. This gives a unique flavor to the chicken combined with crispy golden skin. This product is delicious & can be eaten hot or cold and is ideal when entertaining during the season.
